# scam.stream — Streaming & Digital Scam Database

> Community-powered database of streaming & digital scams. Search, vote, report, and protect yourself. Exposing fraud in the streaming & digital industry.


scam.stream is a community-driven scam exposure platform focused on the streaming & digital industry. Features a searchable database of known scams with risk levels, community voting, reporting tools, and educational resources. Users can search scams, vote on severity, share warnings on social media, and report new scams.


## Pages

- [Homepage — Streaming & Digital scam database and community reports](https://scam.stream)


## Keywords

streaming & digital scams, scam database, fraud alert, scam warning, scam.stream
